coverage_details.organ_transplant: Organ transplant benefit in KSA only, for heart, liver, excluding cost of the organ itself
coverage_details.dental_general: SR 9,000.00 (Nil Deductible). Dental cleaning covered twice a year. Cover crown.
coverage_details.optical: SR 3,000.00; optical for all ages; frame up to optical annual limit
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No Preauthorization required for Gold and VVIP. No Medical Adjudication for Gold.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Employment test for newly hired employees without deductible. Joint Replacement due to trauma or cancer covered. Allergy & Psoriasis treatments covered. Freestyle Libre Sensors covered. Home Healthcare Services (wound care, IV drugs after surgery, urinary catheterization) covered. Meningitis Vaccinations (for Employee & family in Jeddah, Makkah, Madinah) covered. Drug test for 100 random employees covered. Psychiatric exams covered at any NW7 provider, no deductible. Illness from job nature covered. Work accidents not covered. Medication limit equals pre-authorization limit.
